### Prerequisites

You will get most out of this course if took part in the ESI Intro to RoB 2 course on July 6/7th 2021 (or any other RoB 2 introductory training), and/or have extensive experience of using the tool in systematic reviews.

If you would like to refresh you knowledge of the tool, the slides from the Introductory course are available via the following links:  
- [Intro Course Day 1 Slides](https://mcguinlu.github.io/ESI-ROB2-intro/day1/session1.html)  
- [Intro Course Day 2 Slides](https://mcguinlu.github.io/ESI-ROB2-intro/day2/session2.html)
